00025 #ifndef __SkeletonFileFormat_H__
00026 #define __SkeletonFileFormat_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00046     enum SkeletonChunkID {
00047         SKELETON_HEADER            = 0x1000,
00048             // char* version           : Version number check
00049         SKELETON_BONE              = 0x2000,
00050         // Repeating section defining each bone in the system. 
00051         // Bones are assigned indexes automatically based on their order of declaration
00052         // starting with 0.
00053 
00054             // unsigned short handle            : handle of the bone, should be contiguous & start at 0
00055             // Vector3 position                 : position of this bone relative to parent 
00056             // Quaternion orientation           : orientation of this bone relative to parent 
00057 
00058         SKELETON_BONE_PARENT       = 0x3000,
00059         // Record of the parent of a single bone, used to build the node tree
00060         // Repeating section, listed in Bone Index order, one per Bone
00061 
00062             // unsigned short handle             : child bone
00063             // unsigned short parentHandle   : parent bone
00064 
00065         SKELETON_ANIMATION         = 0x4000,
00066         // A single animation for this skeleton
00067 
00068             // char* name                       : Name of the animation
00069             // Real length                      : Length of the animation in seconds
00070 
00071             SKELETON_ANIMATION_TRACK = 0x4100,
00072             // A single animation track (relates to a single bone)
00073             // Repeating section (within SKELETON_ANIMATION)
00074                 
00075                 // unsigned short boneIndex     : Index of bone to apply to
00076 
00077                 SKELETON_ANIMATION_TRACK_KEYFRAME = 0x4110,
00078                 // A single keyframe within the track
00079                 // Repeating section
00080 
00081                     // Real time                    : The time position (seconds)
00082                     // Quaternion rotate            : Rotation to apply at this keyframe
00083                     // Vector3 translate            : Translation to apply at this keyframe
00084     };
00085 
00086 } // namespace
00087 
00088 
00089 #endif
